animeTitle: Garouden: The Way of the Lone Wolf (Dub)
otherNames: 餓狼伝: The Way of the Lone Wolf
synopsis: On the run from his troubled past, Juuzou is forced into competing in a deadly underground fighting tournament. Skilled in the respected martial art Takemiya-ryuu, Juuzou must navigate a path filled with formidable foes and his personal demons — all while dealing with a bounty of three million yen on his head and a detective on his trail.
